checks.name: Verify failure rate within threshold
checks.remediation: Investigate top failed steps and stabilize verify gates before adding new scope.

checks.name: Lead time P90 within threshold
checks.remediation: Split oversized changes and archive in smaller batches.

checks.name: Rework count within threshold
checks.remediation: Strengthen proposal/design clarity and pre-implementation acceptance checks.

checks.name: Active change WIP within threshold
checks.remediation: Pause new starts and close in-flight changes to maintain throughput quality.

checks.name: Spec drift events within threshold
checks.remediation: Backfill missing specs/changes for drifted commits and enforce change-first workflow.

checks.name: Token cost status available
checks.remediation: Run npm run metrics:token-cost -- -Source <provider> -TotalCostUsd <amount> to publish token-cost summary.
